subcategory.name: Product Lists
subcategory.description: Ecommerce product list examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS product list components to build storefront and category pages for your online store with images, prices, and links to more details or purchase options. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

snippet.name: react
snippet.preview:
Products

Basic Tee 8-Pack

Get the full lineup of our Basic Tees. Have a fresh shirt all week, and an extra for laundry day.

8 colors

$256

Basic Tee

Look like a visionary CEO and wear the same black t-shirt every day.

Black

$32

Kinda White Basic Tee

It's probably, like, 5000 Kelvin instead of 6000 K.

White

$32

Stone Basic Tee

White tees stain easily, and black tees fade. This is going to be gray for a while.

Charcoal

$32

Fall Basic Tee 3-Pack

Who need stark minimalism when you could have earth tones? Embrace the season.

Charcoal

$96

Linework Artwork Tee 3-Pack

Get all 3 colors of our popular Linework design and some variety to your monotonous life.

3 colors

$108

Embrace the season.', options: 'Charcoal', imageSrc: '/plus-assets/img/ecommerce-images/category-page-02-image-card-05.jpg', imageAlt: 'Three shirts arranged on table in mustard, dark gray, and olive.', }, { id: 6, name: 'Linework Artwork Tee 3-Pack', href: '#', price: '$108', description: 'Get all 3 colors of our popular Linework design and some variety to your monotonous life.', options: '3 colors', imageSrc: '/plus-assets/img/ecommerce-images/category-page-02-image-card-06.jpg', imageAlt: 'Three shirts in gray, white, and blue arranged on table with same line drawing of hands and shapes overlapping on front of shirt.', }, ] export default function Example() { return (
